CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 8, 1965, pg. 22 reads: "Swingers - Members of the newly formed Gay Chippers Golf Club are ready to take to the links, after a busy indoor season which found them learning some of the basic facts about the game. Archie Poindexter, who served as instructor for the girls, has Shirley Porter demonstrate the proper stance.  Others shown are (left to right) Joyce Ball, Louise Hinton, Mabel Thomas, Ethel Jackson, Lucille Banner, Lorraine Tillman, Dorothy Hill, Sara Lewis, Grace Tanner and Lucille Robinson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Archie Poindexter, instructing Shirley Porter on stance, with other members of the Gay Chippers Golf Club, from left: Joyce Ball, Louise Hinton, Mabel Thomas, Ethel Jackson, Lucille Banner, Lorraine Tillman, Dorothy Hill, Sara Lewis, Grace Tanner, and Lucille Robinson, looking on, gathered in gymnasium
